snippet: Eric T. Schneiderman, New York’s attorney general, wrote a letter asking the drug company that makes naloxone to explain why the cost has increased so much, so fast.
abstract: New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman demands explanation from Amphistar Pharmaceuticals, manufacturer of heroin antidote naloxone, for steep increase in price of drug; in April, Schneiderman's office began $5 million program to reimburse police departments across state for purchases of critical lifesaving drug, and has since seen price surge, in some cases even doubling.
lead_paragraph: Eric T. Schneiderman, New York’s attorney general, wrote a letter asking the drug company that makes naloxone to explain why the cost has increased so much, so fast.

headline.main: New York Attorney General Critical of Heroin Antidote’s Cost
headline.print_headline: Attorney General Critical of Heroin Antidote’s Cost
